00012 /*!\fn void destroy_config_file_section( void *ptr )
00013  *\brief Destroy a config file section 
00014  *\param ptr A pointer to a config file section 
00015  *\return void
00016  */
00017 void destroy_config_file_section( void *ptr )
00018 {
00019                 CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *section = (CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *)ptr;
00020                 if( !section )
00021                                 return ;
00022                 Free( section -> section_name );
00023                 destroy_ht( &section -> entries );
00024                 Free( section );
00025                 return ;
00026 } /* destroy_config_file_section(...) */

00030 /*!\fn CONFIG_FILE *load_config_file( char *filename , int *errors )
00031  *\brief load a config file
00032  *\param filename Filename of the config file
00033  *\param errors pointer to an int which will represent the number of errors encountered when reading config file
00034  *\return NULL or a loaded config file
00035  */
00036 CONFIG_FILE *load_config_file( char *filename , int *errors )
00037 {  
00038                 CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file = NULL ;
00039                 CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *section = NULL ;
00040                 char buffer[ MAX_CONFIG_LINE_LEN ] = "" ;
00041                 char **split_result = NULL ;
00042                 int error = 0 ;
00043                 FILE *in = NULL ;
00044 
00045                 __n_assert( filename , return NULL );
00046                 in = fopen( filename , "r" );
00047                 error = errno ;
00048                 if( !in )
00049                 {
00050                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Unable to open %s: %s" , _str( filename ) , strerror( error ) );
00051                                 return NULL ;
00052                 }
00053                 Malloc( cfg_file , CONFIG_FILE , 1 );
00054                 if( !cfg_file )
00055                 {
00056                                 fclose( in );
00057                                 return NULL ;
00058                 }
00059                 cfg_file -> sections = new_generic_list( 0 );
00060                 if( !cfg_file -> sections )
00061                 {
00062                                 Free( cfg_file );
00063                                 fclose( in );
00064                                 return NULL ;
00065                 }
00066                 cfg_file -> filename = strdup( filename );
00067                 if( !cfg_file -> filename )
00068                 {
00069                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't strdup( %s )" , _str( filename ) );
00070                                 Free( cfg_file );
00071                                 fclose( in );
00072                                 return NULL ;
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 int line_number = 0 ;
00076                 while( fgets( buffer , MAX_CONFIG_LINE_LEN , in ) )
00077                 {
00078                                 NSTRBYTE start = 0 , end = 0 ;
00079 
00080                                 char *bufptr = (char *)&buffer ;
00081                                 line_number ++ ;
00082 
00083                                 bufptr = trim_nocopy( buffer );
00084                                 if( strlen( bufptr ) == 0 )
00085                                 {
00086                                                 continue ;
00087                                 }
00088 
00089                                 switch( bufptr[ 0 ] )
00090                                 {
00091                                                 /* comment */
00092                                                 case '#' :
00093                                                 case ';' :
00094                                                                 continue ;
00095                                                                 /* new section */
00096                                                 case '[' :
00097                                                                 end = 0 ;
00098                                                                 /* go to begin of section name */
00099                                                                 if( skipu( bufptr , ']' , &end , 1 ) != TRUE )
00100                                                                 {
00101                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "coulnd't find end of section at line %d of %s (string:%s)" , line_number , filename , buffer ); 
00102                                                                                 continue ;
00103                                                                 }
00104                                                                 /* keep only the name */
00105                                                                 bufptr ++ ;
00106                                                                 bufptr[ end - 1 ] = '\0' ;
00107                                                                 bufptr = trim_nocopy( bufptr );
00108                                                                 if( strlen( bufptr ) == 0 )
00109                                                                 {
00110                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "section without name at line %d" , line_number );
00111                                                                                 continue ;
00112                                                                 }
00113 
00114                                                                 Malloc( section  , CONFIG_FILE_SECTION , 1 );
00115                                                                 __n_assert( section , break );
00116 
00117                                                                 section -> section_name = strdup( bufptr );
00118                                                                 if( !section -> section_name )
00119                                                                 {
00120                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't duplicate %s" , bufptr );
00121                                                                                 continue ;
00122                                                                 }
00123 
00124                                                                 section -> entries = new_ht( CONFIG_SECTION_HASH_TABLE_LEN );
00125                                                                 if( !section -> entries )
00126                                                                 {
00127                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "error creating [%s] hash table of size %d" , bufptr , CONFIG_SECTION_HASH_TABLE_LEN );
00128                                                                                 continue ;
00129                                                                 }
00130                                                                 list_push( cfg_file -> sections , section , &destroy_config_file_section );
00131                                                                 continue ;
00132 
00133                                                                 /* if it's not a comment, not a section, not empty, then it's an entry ! */
00134                                                 default:
00135                                                                 if( !section )
00136                                                                 {
00137                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "entry without section at line %d of %s (string:%s)" , line_number , filename , bufptr ); 
00138                                                                                 continue ;
00139                                                                 }
00140                                                                 split_result = split( bufptr , "=" , 0 );
00141                                                                 if( !split_result )
00142                                                                 {
00143                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't find entry separator '=' at line %d of %s (string:%s)" , line_number , filename , bufptr ); 
00144                                                                                 continue ;
00145                                                                 }
00146                                                                 if( strlen( trim_nocopy( split_result[ 0 ] ) ) == 0 )
00147                                                                 {
00148                                                                                 free_split_result( &split_result );
00149                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't find entry name at line %d of %s (string:%s)" , line_number , filename , (char *)buffer[ start ] ); 
00150                                                                                 continue ;
00151                                                                 }
00152 
00153                                                                 if( strlen( trim_nocopy( split_result[ 1 ] ) ) == 0 )
00154                                                                 {
00155                                                                                 free_split_result( &split_result );
00156                                                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't find value for entry at line %d of %s (string:%s)" , line_number , filename ,  (char *)buffer[ start ] ); 
00157                                                                                 continue ;
00158                                                                 }
00159                                                                 char *result = NULL ;
00160                                                                 N_STR *entry_key = NULL ;
00161                                                                 int nb_entry_in_sections = 0 ;
00162                                                                 while( TRUE )
00163                                                                 {
00164                                                                                 nstrprintf( entry_key , "%s%d" , trim_nocopy( split_result[ 0 ] ) , nb_entry_in_sections );
00165                                                                                 if( ht_get_ptr( section -> entries , _nstr( entry_key ) , (void **)&result )  == FALSE )
00166                                                                                 {
00167                                                                                                 break ;
00168                                                                                 }
00169                                                                                 nb_entry_in_sections ++ ;
00170                                                                                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00171                                                                 }
00172                                                                 ht_put_ptr( section -> entries , _nstr( entry_key ) , strdup( trim_nocopy( split_result[ 1 ] ) ) , free ); 
00173                                                                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00174                                                                 free_split_result( &split_result );
00175                                                                 continue ;
00176                                 }
00177                 }
00178                 if( !feof( in ) )
00179                 {
00180                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "couldn't read EOF for %s" , filename );
00181                 }
00182                 fclose( in );
00183 
00184                 return cfg_file ;
00185 
00186 } /*load_config_file */

00190 /*!\fn int get_nb_config_file_sections( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name )
00191  *\brief Get the number of config file with section_name
00192  *\param cfg_file Config file to process 
00193  *\param section_name name of sections to search 
00194  *\return The number of named sections or a negative value
00195  */
00196 int get_nb_config_file_sections( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name )
00197 {
00198                 __n_assert( cfg_file , return -1 );
00199                 __n_assert( cfg_file -> sections , return -2 );
00200                 __n_assert( section_name , return -3 );
00201 
00202                 int nb_sections = 0 ;
00203                 list_foreach( listnode , cfg_file -> sections )
00204                 {
00205                                 CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *section = (CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *)listnode -> ptr ;
00206                                 if( !strcmp( section -> section_name , section_name ) )
00207                                 {
00208                                                 nb_sections ++ ;
00209                                 }
00210                 }
00211                 return nb_sections ;
00212 } /* get_nb_config_file_sections(...) */
00213

00216 /*!\fn int get_nb_config_file_sections_entries( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name ,  int section_position , char *entry )
00217  *\brief Get the number of config file with section_name
00218  *\param cfg_file Config file to process 
00219  *\param section_name name of sections to search 
00220  *\param section_position position of the section if there are multiples same name sections 
00221  *\param entry name of entry to retrieve 
00222  *\return The number of named sections entries or a negative value
00223  */
00224 int get_nb_config_file_sections_entries( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name , int section_position , char *entry )
00225 {
00226                 __n_assert( cfg_file , return -1 );
00227                 __n_assert( cfg_file -> sections , return -2 );
00228                 __n_assert( section_name , return -3 );
00229                 __n_assert( entry , return -4 );
00230 
00231                 int nb_sections = 0 ;
00232                 int nb_entry_in_sections = 0 ;
00233                 list_foreach( listnode , cfg_file -> sections )
00234                 {
00235                                 CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *section = (CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *)listnode -> ptr ;
00236                                 if( !strcmp( section -> section_name , section_name ) )
00237                                 {
00238                                                 if( nb_sections == section_position )
00239                                                 {
00240                                                                 char *result = NULL ;
00241                                                                 N_STR *entry_key = NULL ;
00242                                                                 while( TRUE )
00243                                                                 {
00244                                                                                 nstrprintf( entry_key , "%s%d" , entry , nb_entry_in_sections );
00245                                                                                 if( ht_get_ptr( section -> entries , _nstr( entry_key ) , (void **)&result )  == FALSE )
00246                                                                                 {
00247                                                                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "ht_get_ptr( %p , trim_nocopy( %s ) , (void **)&result ) returned FALSE !" , section -> entries , _nstr( entry_key ) );
00248                                                                                                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00249                                                                                                 break ;
00250                                                                                 }
00251                                                                                 nb_entry_in_sections ++ ;
00252                                                                                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00253                                                                 }
00254                                                                 break ;
00255                                                 }
00256                                                 nb_sections ++ ;
00257                                 }
00258                 }
00259                 return nb_entry_in_sections ;
00260 } /* get_nb_config_file_sections_entries(...) */

00264 /*!\fn char *get_config_section_value( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name , int section_position , char *entry , int entry_position )
00265  *\brief Function to parse sections and get entries values
00266  *\param cfg_file name of config file
00267  *\param section_name name of section
00268  *\param section_position section number
00269  *\param entry entry name
00270  *\param entry_position entry number
00271  *\return the value of the named entry in section[ position ]
00272  */
00273 char *get_config_section_value( CONFIG_FILE *cfg_file , char *section_name , int section_position , char *entry , int entry_position )
00274 {
00275                 __n_assert( cfg_file , return NULL );
00276                 __n_assert( cfg_file -> sections , return NULL );
00277                 __n_assert( section_name , return NULL );
00278                 __n_assert( entry , return NULL );
00279 
00280                 if( section_position >= cfg_file -> sections -> nb_items )
00281                 {
00282                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "section_position (%d) is higher than the number of item in list (%d)" , section_position ,  cfg_file -> sections -> nb_items );
00283                                 return NULL ;
00284                 }
00285 
00286                 int section_position_it = 0 ;
00287                 HASH_TABLE *entries = NULL ;
00288                 list_foreach( listnode , cfg_file -> sections )
00289                 {
00290                                 CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *section = (CONFIG_FILE_SECTION *)listnode -> ptr ;
00291                                 if( !strcmp( section -> section_name , section_name ) )
00292                                 {
00293                                                 if( section_position_it == section_position )
00294                                                 {
00295                                                                 entries = section -> entries ;
00296                                                                 break ;
00297                                                 }
00298                                                 section_position_it ++ ;
00299                                 }
00300                 }
00301 
00302                 char *result = NULL ;
00303                 N_STR *entry_key = NULL ;
00304                 nstrprintf( entry_key , "%s%d" , entry , entry_position );
00305                 if( ht_get_ptr( entries , _nstr( entry_key ) , (void **)&result )  == FALSE )
00306                 {
00307                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "ht_get_ptr( %p , trim_nocopy( %s ) , (void **)&result ) returned FALSE !" , entries , _nstr( entry_key ) );
00308                                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00309                                 return NULL ;
00310                 }
00311                 free_nstr( &entry_key );
00312 
00313                 return result ;
00314 } /* get_config_section_value */

00318 /*!\fn int destroy_config_file( CONFIG_FILE **cfg_file )
00319  *\brief Destroy a loaded config file
00320  *\param cfg_file pointer to a loaded config file to destroy
00321  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00322  */
00323 int destroy_config_file( CONFIG_FILE **cfg_file )
00324 {
00325                 __n_assert( (*cfg_file) , return FALSE );
00326 
00327                 Free( (*cfg_file) -> filename );
00328 
00329                 if( (*cfg_file) -> sections )
00330                 {
00331                                 list_destroy( &(*cfg_file) -> sections );
00332                 }
00333 
00334                 Free( (*cfg_file) );
00335 
00336                 return TRUE ;
00337 } /* destroy_config_file */
